scripts.build: npm run lint && npm test && npm run build:cjs && npm run build:es && npm run build:umd && npm run build:min
scripts.build:cjs: rimraf dist && cross-env BABEL_ENV=cjs babel ./src -d dist
scripts.build:es: rimraf es && cross-env BABEL_ENV=es babel ./src -d es
scripts.build:umd: cross-env BABEL_ENV=cjs cross-env NODE_ENV=development webpack --config webpack.umd.js
scripts.build:min: cross-env BABEL_ENV=cjs cross-env NODE_ENV=production webpack --config webpack.umd.js
scripts.test: cross-env BABEL_ENV=cjs karma start karma.conf.js --single-run --browsers PhantomJS
scripts.test:all: cross-env BABEL_ENV=cjs karma start karma.conf.js --single-run --browsers Chrome,Firefox,IE,Safari,Opera
